title: Percentage of e-commerce in total U.S. Q4 retail sales 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales and Q4 '10 has the lowest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales.
The difference of Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.9.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '10.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales and Q4 '10 has the lowest Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales.
The difference of Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.9.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales for 10 number of Quarters.
The maximum Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales 11.5 is found at Quarter Q4 '19 and the minimum is found at Q4 '10 where Quarter is 4.6.
Quarter Q4 '18 has the second highest value for Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales of Quarter Q4 '10 is 2.5% smaller than the maximum value at Q4 '19.
Quarter Q4 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 11.5, followed by Q4 '18, and Q4 '17. Down to Quarter Q4 '10 with the lowest value 4.6.
The Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales has lowered over the past 10 Quarters.
Considered together, the average Estimated share of e-commerce in total sales in all 10 Quarters is roughly 7.43.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 74.3.
